EmailTemplate.description: Term 3 Weekend Football Programme - Hosted at BSG.
EmailTemplate.name: Term 3 Weekend Football Programme - Hosted at BSG.
EmailTemplate.subject: Term 3 Weekend Football Programme - Hosted at BSG.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
The Guangzhou Football Academy's (GFA's) summer programme begins this week and will run until 22nd June 2014.
SUMMARY OF TIMES:
Thursdays:
4.15 - 5.45pm - 6-8 year olds
4.15 - 5.45pm - 9-12 year olds
(When BSG has no ASAs, starting times will be an hour earlier)
Saturdays:
1.30 - 3.00pm - 5-6 year olds
3.00 - 4.30pm - 7-9 year olds
4.30 - 6.00pm - 10+ year olds
Sundays:
9.00 - 10.30 - 5-6 year olds
10.30 - 12.00 - 7-9 year olds
12.00 - 14.00 - 10+ & U16
13:30 - 15:00 - Girls Only Training
If you are interested in enrolling your child please CLICK HERE for further details or contact the GFA directly through guangzhoufa@gmail.com or (+852)5600-6994.
We hope you enjoy the GFA’s weekend football programme this term hosted at the British School of Guangzhou.
Best wishes,
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
——————————————————————————————————————
A Nord Anglia Education School - University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International Schools In Asia (FOBISIA)- Member of the Council of British International Schools (COBIS) - Member of the Council of International Schools (CIS) - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
